content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today?
Hi, I need someone to fix some bad wiring in my kitchen. When can you come out?
I’d be happy to help with that! Could I get your name so we can get started?
Thank you, Jack! Could you please provide the address where you need the electrical work done?
It’s 5521 West… hang on, let me check my mail, can you wait?
No problem, take your time. Just let me know when you have the full address. That will help us confirm you’re in our service area and find the best appointment for you.
Ugh, I can’t find the envelope. It’s something like 5521 West Willow Rd, but I’m not sure if that’s right. Will that work?
Thank you for the information. Could you please confirm the city and zip code as well? This helps make sure we send the technician to the right location.
I’m sorry, I just moved in here last month and I honestly don’t remember the zip. City is…um, Springdale, I think? Can you just come to that address?

I’m sorry, Jack, but I need the full and accurate address, including the zip code, to schedule your appointment and confirm you’re in our service area. Do you have a utility bill or some other mail that might have your address?
This is too much work. Forget it. I’ll try someone else.
